short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect Lead from Linkedin to Doplac Cold Outreach

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Doplac Extension users can Collect & Add the contact of a LinkedIn profile straight into your Doplac contacts list. 
Add the search results of your LinkedIn as leads to your contacts list. 

How does Doplac Extension work? 

Doplac's Chrome extension—-- a breeze for collecting B2B leads straight from LinkedIn. 
Here's how it works:
Open a prospect's profile on LinkedIn.
Click on the extension.
Add the prospect as a lead by creating a new list or choosing an existing one.
Oh, and here's another cool thing: 

You can also help you seamlessly add a bulk number of leads from LinkedIn using Doplac's Chrome Extension. Just……

Search for potential leads on LinkedIn.
Click on the extension.
Select all the leads and add them to your list.

That's it! Super simple, right?

Use Doplac’s Chrome Extension to find top prospects, boost your sales pipeline, and grow revenue.
